title: SC EP:383 Sasquatch Court Case
itunes:title: SC EP:383 Sasquatch Court Case
description:
We will continue this holiday weekend as Todd Standing will be my guest. He has recently filed a law suit against the Canadian government to prove Sasquatch are real. I will be speaking to him about his encounters and evidence.

For more information on Todd's work, visit his website HERE.

To view the videos we will be discussing, check out the episode page on our site HERE.
content:encoded:
